subject: Hockey, Ice
Helmets
Eyes and Eyesight
lead_paragraph: After losing an eye to a high stick in 1973, Greg Neeld developed and wore the first helmet visor. It’s about time they were mandatory, he says.
snippet: After losing an eye to a high stick in 1973, Greg Neeld developed and wore the first helmet visor. It’s about time they were mandatory, he says.
